reviews.review: Do not play this game if you value your life or your time. It becomes as important and demanding as a needy boyfriend. <3
I love this game and I play it all the time, like all games there will be issues here and there of course, but overall this game is wonderful and fun!

I bought these games for the "Lulz" but ended up spending too much money within the 30hrs on record. These game steals your soul.
Pretty fun, its cool a cool game to try and get good at. Feels unfair at times but it can go both ways
Don't buy this game unless you have a spare keyboard a spare monitor and a spare brain.

Played this game when it was free and ended up playing like 10 hours before I actually bought it. Love the game. Boring without friends, with friends it's super fun. I hope they find a way to do in-voice coms so you can talk to your other team mates. Game is definitely worth the price

nah
Don't let all these new negative reviews fool you. It was trash before the NFTs, too.
Good game, very fun. Can be hard and toxic though. A little buggy but still very much enjoy it.
Fun to play solo and even more fun to play with friends

This game has horrible late reactions. I move around normally and then it takes me 10 seconds to stop moving and do what I wanted to do because my fucking character is moving everywhere. Behavior, fix this game please.
buen juego , te engancha mucho y ademas muy variado en cuando mecanicas
Besides all of the bugs- I mean... features the game is pretty chill.

COOL GAME. Honestly It's a really good combination of horror and balanced online co-op, and probably one of my favorite online games. The character choice provides a vast selection of skill, and it encourages specific skill in specific situations. This game mainstreams one's ability to withstand pressure and horror tolerance, and it does it in any way that I have never seen before in a game. Solid 9/10.
The highest of highs and the lowest of lows.  You play for the thrills.

Incredibly addicting asymmetrical horror game, arguably the best in the genre. You can unlock some DLC for free just by playing the game, and there are so many survivors, killers, and perks to obtain and rift challenges to complete that you will have new things to do for a very long time. If you're looking to hide from/evade a terrifying killer or mercilessly hunt down and kill survivors, this is the game for you!
extremely fun game, I've accumulated hundreds of hours on this game and I must say it is extraordinary, one of a kind
Great game for anyone who like being tortured and received loves from mr/mrs killers

Great Horror/survival pvp game. a interesting concept done right, 4 survivors and 1 killer pvp only no bots. Once you get the hang of this game its a blast to play, i do have to say though the learning curve can be one of the roughest things ever because its highly punishing if you make a mistake. But after all of that it should be alot more fun, also there is custom games where you can verse your friends, but the game is the most balanced with 4 survivors and 1 killer so make sure you have 5 people for the best experience. another great thing about this game is as of writing this review, they are still doing updates to it after 5 years and there are no signs of the devs slowing down, adding new killers, survivors, maps, etc.

If u are survivor: you can run around and let killer chase you and troll him out, do gens, choose not to help your 3 other survivors and laugh about it.

If you are killer: you can enjoy slashing survivors and make fun of the last survivor by not hooking him the last second and let the him suffer waiting for the game to end and feed the inner sadistic behavior in you.

Overall a fun game. 8/10.
If you want to waste your money to meet the most toxic community ever then go ahead.

This game has changed a lot since it's release. IMO I'd say they're mostly positive.

This is a good game to spend maybe 20 to 40 minutes bumming around with friends if you aren't in the mood for a huge single player game in the moment.

Fun to play until a survivor that you hooked 3 times acros the match calls you a camper and a tunneler, that and gen rushing. other than that 10/10 would recommend. P.S. get your best insults ready you will need them.

Addictive and tiring at the same time.

All in all the games a lot of fun. 

BUT, what is the HUD even trying to tell me as survivor, as a new player seeing a timer around my character icon tells me nothing, I don't even know what the killer is, how am I supposed to outplay something that I've never seen before that tells me close to nothing. Also there are FAR too many statuses to know and often its not told what it does. "blah blah blah will suffer from the haemorrhaging status" cool.. and that does? On that note could you not have just called it "bleeding"? for real? 

Queue times as a killer is a nightmare, and as a new player its never fun waiting 5+ minutes just to get paired against rank 4 players who have full perks from multiple characters, purple items with ultra rare attachments, to lose in a shorter time that it took the queue to pop because everyone and their nan wants to kill people. There's not much that can be done about that, being a killer is dope. Luckily the game "hemorrhages" bloodpoints during events so it shouldn't take too long to get a killer to a high enough level to put up a fight, still, if you level up a killer you hate, then you're kinda boned unless you play 5 hours as survivor. Either you play countless games with a long af queue to find a killer you like then level that one up, which you wont know if you like properly because you have nothing for that character which feels like pulling teeth or you play games with friends who also have to game to see what you like, Kinda hard if you have no friends though.

Now I've ragged on about what I don't like, and i haven't said anything really good about this game, but, goddamn is it a fun game. If you have a full party of 5 its a great time, you can try out characters with all the perks unlocked so you're never at a disadvantage against friends who no lived this game, well apart from the skill disadvantage, it also allows you to try out what you like. And its so much fun doing so, drinking and playing with friends is great, public play can be a bit eh at times. Unlocking new characters isn't too difficult either which is a huge plus.

Some of the killers make no sense from a survivor perspective, I've played multiple games against Edward Scissorhands or whatever the fuck his name is and I STILL don't know what the fuck is going on. 

8/10 would be sacrificed to a giant space demon spider deity again.
i passed the 2 hours mark and regreted everyting, dont buy this shitty game
Jogo muito bom pra poder deixar a gente surtadÃ­ssimo.

This game is just top tier. In my experience, I laughed, I raged, I almost broke mah monitor. But, I keep playing the game because I actually enjoy it. 
I also recommend playing with your friends. And while you're at it, communicate with eachother by calling in discord or something.
But yeah this game is very fun to play and I hope you would enjoy it too. :)
